title: Switzerland defender Senderos goes home to join Grasshoppers
title_page: Switzerland defender Senderos goes home to join Grasshoppers | Daily Mail Online
text:
Switzerland defender Senderos goes home to join Grasshoppers
ZURICH (AP) — Former Arsenal and AC Milan defender Philippe Senderos has returned home to Switzerland to join Grasshoppers.
The Zurich club says the 30-year-old Senderos has signed a six-month contract.
Senderos was a free agent since agreeing with Aston Villa this week to terminate his contract after falling out of favor. He is seeking to revive his career and international selection chances ahead of the European Championship.
Senderos, who has played at three World Cups, made the last of his 55 appearances for Switzerland almost 18 months ago.
